動物用藥品名稱: 維克犬兒健犬瘟熱、傳染性肝炎、腺病毒第二型、小病毒、副流行性感冒活毒、鉤端螺旋體、狂犬病不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 臺灣維克法蘭斯股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 犬：預防犬瘟熱、傳染性肝炎、腺病毒第二型、小病毒、副流行性感冒、鉤端螺旋體及狂犬病感染。
ingredients: Live attenuated Canine Distemper Virus (Lederle strain).....at least 10^3 TCID50; Live attenuated Canine ContagiousHepatitis Virus (Manhattan strain).....at least 300 TCID50;Live attenuated Canine Parvovirus (CPV 780916 strain).....at least 10^5 TCID50; Live attenuated Canine Parainfluenza Virus(Manhattan strain)......at least 10^5 TCID50; InactivatedLeptospira Interrogans Canicola(CBS STRAIN).....at least 800x10^6bacteria; Inactivated Leptospira Interrogans Icterohaemorrhagiae（IS3 STRAIN）.....at least 800x10^6 bacteria;Inactivated Rabies Virus (VP12 strain).....at least 1IU.
